ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: no, because people can learn little things from this course
Yes, it is a useful couse.
I will recommend CS 545 because data mining is really useful. It's a typical application of machine learning. Anyone who is interested in database or machine learning should take it.
Yes. Begin write code as soon as possible.

You will learn how to program scientific methods correctly, and you will unlearn many bad habits. You will understand what things like condition number, SVD, nearest neighbors, spectrum, Newton's method, etc. actually mean and why they are useful. If you are motivated and want to make an extra effort to learn the material, you will benefit greatly from this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Better understanding how to use mathematics.
It gave me an idea what data mining is.
Data mining is a typical application of machine learning. It's really helpful to my research on machine learning.

The programming techniques covered have been immediately helpful to my research and my studies in general. Many fundamental numerical and data mining techniques were covered which are essential to scientific computing in general. I will very likely have to use many of the methods we implemented for this class in my research and future coursework.
